thread.title: BRIEF-American Equity Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.41

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-American Equity Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.41

organizations.name: american equity investment life holding co

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - American Equity Investment Life Holding Co :
* AMERICAN EQUITY REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.82 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.41 * AMERICAN EQUITY INVESTMENT LIFE HOLDING - ‍IMPACT OF TAX REFORM WAS A REDUCTION OF NET INCOME FOR QUARTER OF $35.9 MILLION, OR $0.40 PER SHARE​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
